languages.text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда существо, находящееся в зоне способности Области танатофобии получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, оно должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}. При провале на него накладывается эффект Танатофобия на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers damage, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Когда существо, находящееся в зоне способности Области танатофобии получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, оно должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}. При провале на него накладывается эффект Танатофобия на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the Thanatophobia Zone suffers damage, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the Thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: 每当处于死亡恐惧区域的生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得“死亡恐惧”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当处于死亡恐惧区域的生物受到伤害时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得“死亡恐惧”效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: 死恐怖症地帯にいる生物が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けたとき、その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、死恐怖症の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 死恐怖症地帯にいる生物がダメージを受けた時、その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、死恐怖症の効果を得る。

languages.text: Cuando una criatura en la zona de tanatofobia sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla, sufre el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de tanatofobia durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando una criatura en la zona de tanatofobia sufre daños, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla, sufre el efecto de tanatofobia durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Erleidet eine Kreatur in der Thanatophobie-Zone {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, muss sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Nichtbestehen erhält sie 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den Thanatophobie-Effekt.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet eine Kreatur in der Thanatophobie-Zone Schaden, muss sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Nichtbestehen erhält sie 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den Thanatophobie-Effekt.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une créature située dans la zone de thanatophobie subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle est frappée par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} de Thanatophobie pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une créature située dans la zone de thanatophobie subit des dégâts, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle est frappée par l'effet de Thanatophobie pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
